languages.text: {n}Улыбка Комиссара становится неприятной.{/n} "Сестра Арджента, что за обвинения я слышу?! Неужто ужасы, что встретились тебе в битве, были столь невыносимы, что ввергли тебя в слепоту безумия?!" {n}Изменник умело подбавляет в голос демонстративной подозрительности.{/n} "Или наш коварный враг отравил твой разум каким-нибудь богохульным воздействием?!"

{n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"
languages.original_text: {n}Улыбка Комиссара становится неприятной.{/n} "Сестра Арджента, что за обвинения я слышу?! Неужто ужасы, что встретились тебе в битве, были столь невыносимы, что ввергли тебя в слепоту безумия?!" {n}Изменник умело подбавляет в голос демонстративной подозрительности.{/n} "Или наш коварный враг отравил твой разум каким-нибудь богохульным воздействием?!"

Were you blinded by the madness that followed?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or did our cunning enemy poison your mind with some wicked influence?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

languages.text: {n}政委的笑容变得不悦。{/n}“阿洁塔修女，这无端的指责究竟是怎么回事？莫非是战斗的恐怖让你惊惧不已？莫非你是被随之而来的疯狂蒙蔽了双眼？”{n}他的声音中带上了恰到好处的怀疑意味。{/n}“还是说，我们狡猾的敌人用某种邪恶的力量毒害了你的思想？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}政委的笑容变得不悦。{/n}“阿洁塔修女，这无端的指责究竟是怎么回事？莫非是战斗的恐怖让你惊惧不已？莫非你是被随之而来的疯狂蒙蔽了双眼？”{n}他的声音中带上了恰到好处的怀疑意味。{/n}“还是说，我们狡猾的敌人用某种邪恶的力量毒害了你的思想？”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーの笑顔は不愉快な表情に変わった。{/n}「シスター・アルジェンタ、一体何を言い出すかと思えば…先の戦闘で動揺しているのですか？狂気の沙汰を目撃して目がくらんでしまったのかね？」{n}彼は疑念を含ませながら言葉を発した。{/n}「それとも…狡猾な敵の邪悪さに触れてしまい、心を毒されてしまったのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーの笑顔は不愉快な表情に変わった。{/n}「シスター・アルジェンタ、一体何を言い出すかと思えば…先の戦闘で動揺しているのですか？狂気の沙汰を目撃して目がくらんでしまったのかね？」{n}彼は疑念を含ませながら言葉を発した。{/n}「それとも…狡猾な敵の邪悪さに触れてしまい、心を毒されてしまったのでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa del Comisario se vuelve desagradable.{/n} «Hermana Argenta, ¿qué son esas acusaciones? ¿Es posible que los horrores de la batalla le hayan nublado el juicio? ¿La ha cegado la locura que nos rodea?». {n}Añade un toque medido de sospecha a su voz.{/n} «¿O acaso nuestro astuto enemigo ha envenenado su mente con su maligna influencia?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La sonrisa del Comisario se vuelve desagradable.{/n} «Hermana Argenta, ¿qué son esas acusaciones? ¿Es posible que los horrores de la batalla le hayan nublado el juicio? ¿La ha cegado la locura que nos rodea?». {n}Añade un toque medido de sospecha a su voz.{/n} «¿O acaso nuestro astuto enemigo ha envenenado su mente con su maligna influencia?».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

languages.text: {n}Le sourire du commissaire se fait moins avenant.{/n} « Sœur Argenta, quelles sont ces accusations ? Les horreurs du combat vous auraient-elles bouleversée à ce point ? Auriez-vous été aveuglée par la frénésie qui s'est ensuivie ? Ou notre ennemi aurait-il exercé son influence empoisonnée sur votre esprit ? » {n}Dans sa voix, vous décelez une pointe parfaitement dosée de suspicion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire du commissaire se fait moins avenant.{/n} « Sœur Argenta, quelles sont ces accusations ? Les horreurs du combat vous auraient-elles bouleversée à ce point ? Auriez-vous été aveuglée par la frénésie qui s'est ensuivie ? Ou notre ennemi aurait-il exercé son influence empoisonnée sur votre esprit ? » {n}Dans sa voix, vous décelez une pointe parfaitement dosée de suspicion.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Das Lächeln des Kommissars wird unangenehm.{/n} "Schwester Argenta, was höre ich da für Anschuldigungen? Haben Euch vielleicht die Schrecken des Kampfs so durcheinandergebracht? Hat Euch der grassierende Wahnsinn blind gemacht?" {n}Er fügt seiner Stimme eine wohldosierte Prise Misstrauen hinzu.{/n} "Oder hat unser raffinierter Feind Euren Geist mit seinem bösartigen Einfluss vergiftet?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Lächeln des Kommissars wird unangenehm.{/n} "Schwester Argenta, was höre ich da für Anschuldigungen? Haben Euch vielleicht die Schrecken des Kampfs so durcheinandergebracht? Hat Euch der grassierende Wahnsinn blind gemacht?" {n}Er fügt seiner Stimme eine wohldosierte Prise Misstrauen hinzu.{/n} "Oder hat unser raffinierter Feind Euren Geist mit seinem bösartigen Einfluss vergiftet?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser'in gülümsemesi, nahoş bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Rahibe Argenta, bu sözünü ettiğin suçlamalar da neyin nesi? Çatışmanın dehşeti yüzünden kafan karışmış, sebep olduğu delilik nedeniyle gerçekleri görmez olmuş olabilir misin?" {n}Sesine tam olması gereken ölçüde, hedefe yönelik bir şüphe tonu katıyor.{/n} "Yoksa sinsi düşmanımız, bir çeşit kötücül nüfuzla zihnini mi zehirledi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's smile becomes unpleasant.{/n} "Sister Argenta, what are these accusations I'm hearing? Could it be that the horrors of combat have rattled you so? Have you been blinded by the ensuing madness?" {n}He adds a well-measured dash of pointed suspicion to his voice.{/n} "Or has our cunning enemy poisoned your mind with some wicked influence?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser'in gülümsemesi nahoş bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Rahibe Argenta, bu sözünü ettiğin suçlamalar da neyin nesi? Çatışmanın dehşeti dengeni bozmuş olabilir mi? Onu takip eden bir delilik nedeniyle kör olmuş olabilir misin?" {n}Sesine tam olması gereken ölçüde, hedefe yönelik bir şüphe tonu katıyor.{/n} "Yoksa sinsi düşmanımız, bir çeşit kötücül nüfuzla zihnini mi zehirledi?"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
